argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | xrrest.1 | |- X = ( ordTop ` <_ ) |
| 2 |  | xrrest.2 | |- R = ( topGen ` ran (,) ) |
| 3 | 1 | #P_oveq1i | |- ( X |`t RR ) = ( ( ordTop ` <_ ) |`t RR ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_xrtgioo | |- ( topGen ` ran (,) ) = ( X |`t RR ) |
| 5 | 2, 4 | #P_eqtri | |- R = ( X |`t RR ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_oveq1i | |- ( R |`t A ) = ( ( X |`t RR ) |`t A ) |
| 7 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( ordTop ` <_ ) e. _V |
| 8 | 1, 7 | #P_eqeltri | |- X e. _V |
| 9 |  | #P_reex | |- RR e. _V |
| 10 |  | #P_restabs | |- ( ( X e. _V /\ A C_ RR /\ RR e. _V ) -> ( ( X |`t RR ) |`t A ) = ( X |`t A ) ) |
| 11 | 8, 9, 10 | #P_mp3an13 | |- ( A C_ RR -> ( ( X |`t RR ) |`t A ) = ( X |`t A ) ) |
| 12 | 6, 11 | #P_syl5req | |- ( A C_ RR -> ( X |`t A ) = ( R |`t A ) ) |
